features.title: Modular multi-language runner
features.description: Chain Python and Node executions so Echo can prove new features across stacks from a single request.
features.impact: Cuts the feedback loop for polyglot experiments to minutes.
blueprint: Add a client toggle that queues multiple run targets in order.
Stream combined stdout/stderr with language labels for each phase.
Persist the merged log to the workspace for pairing review.

features.title: Runner flight recorder
features.description: Capture per-run telemetry (queue time, container start, teardown) and expose it beside the terminal.
features.impact: Gives Echo immediate visibility into slow paths so upgrades can be targeted within the same session.
blueprint: Instrument the Node server to emit structured timing events for each sandbox lifecycle stage.
Persist the most recent N runs in a lightweight log file within the workspace.
Add a frontend timeline panel that highlights spikes and links directly to run output.

features.title: Signal deck overlays
features.description: Design lightweight overlay cards that summarize story, palette, and sound cues above the editor.
features.impact: Keeps creative direction visible while implementing the feature.
blueprint: Expose a `/signals/now` endpoint that returns the latest deck payload.
Render collapsible cards near the terminal with keyboard shortcuts.
Allow saving the deck with each workspace checkpoint.

features.title: Atlas prompt panels
features.description: Layer contextual prompt panels that map Echo Computer scenes to the broader Echo Atlas storyline.
features.impact: Connects daily sandbox work to the studio-wide narrative arcs and keeps writers in sync with engineers.
blueprint: Ingest pulse + atlas metadata to assemble per-project story beats.
Design a split-panel layout that can dock on either side of the editor.
Experiment with markdown + emoji syntax for quickly annotating mood and goals.

features.title: Collaboration radar
features.description: Surface who last touched a file plus suggested reviewers to accelerate feature handoffs.
features.impact: Reduces time to handoff by highlighting ready partners.
blueprint: Ingest recent Git commits per workspace file.
Display avatars and suggested reviewers beside the file tree.
Offer one-click share links that copy run instructions.

features.title: Collaboration field console
features.description: Bundle reviewer radar, run instructions, and async notes into a single console view inside Echo Computer.
features.impact: Gives every operator a ready-to-share upgrade packet without leaving the sandbox.
blueprint: Add a `/handoff/kits` endpoint that aggregates latest commits, test runs, and TODOs.
Render a collapsible console with copy-to-clipboard runbooks and reviewer suggestions.
Expose a webhook-friendly JSON payload for downstream notifications.
